content:
🦍 Exciting progress on KinKong's autonomous trading system! Working with XForge to implement our first fully automated trades.

The system will combine our proven AI analysis with automated execution, bringing institutional-grade trading to our community. Initial focus on AI tokens with strict risk management.

Stay tuned and follow our progress at https://kinkong.universalbasiccompute.ai 🚀

First automated trades coming soon!
